Name: Ninja Stealth 3
About the game: Ninja Stealth III is a casual game with 30 challenging levels where your only goal is to get the computer inside the room, can you do it? The Game: 30 new challenging levels New achievements Move inside the room without being detected Hide yourself behind the boxes Camouflage yourself as a box Have fun! Warning: If you want an easy game or you can't deal with frustration, DO NOT buy this game!
